snippet: The nation’s largest automaker last paid a quarterly dividend in 2008, before it entered and exited bankruptcy with the help of a $49.5 billion taxpayer bailout.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s largest automaker last paid a quarterly dividend in 2008, before it entered and exited bankruptcy with the help of a $49.5 billion taxpayer bailout.

headline.main: After Six Years, G.M. Restores Its Common Stock Dividend
headline.print_headline: After Six Years, G.M. Restores Its Common Stock Dividend
